ref: 1710 utkara m. ʻ anything dug out, rubbish ʼ AitBr., ʻ heap ʼ MBh. 2. utkāra -- m. ʻ piling up ʼ Pāṇ. 3. utkira -- ʻ heaping up ʼ Kālid. 4. *utkēra -- infl. by *utkērayati. &rcirclemacr 1. Pk. ukkara -- m. ʻ collection ʼ, ˚aḍa -- m. ʻ heap of dirt ʼ, ukkuruḍa -- m. ʻ heap ʼ, ˚ḍī -- , ˚ḍiyā -- f. ʻ muck -- heap ʼ; Or. ukara ʻ abuse with reference to hidden family scandals ʼ; G. ukarṛɔ m., ˚ṛī f., ukayṛɔ m. ʻ rubbish heap ʼ (or < 3).
